game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you must explore the forgotten ruins to uncover the lost artifact. Beware of the traps and guards that protect it.
game.reward: You will gain 100 experience points and a rare magical item upon completion.

task.description: Locate and enter the entrance to the ruins, marked by an ancient tree.
Bypass or disarm the magical traps that guard the artifact.
Confront and defeat the ancient spirit that protects the artifact.
